meanings.definition: A person who begets or brings forth offspring.
meanings.sent1: The begetters of the puppies were the two dogs.
meanings.sent2: The begetters of the family tree are the grandparents.
meanings.sent3: The begetters of the mischief-making duo were their parents.
meanings.sent4: The begetters of creativity are often found in solitude.
meanings.sent5: The begetters of life are celebrated in nature's beauty.

meanings.definition: Those who are responsible for the creation or production of something.
meanings.sent1: The begetters of the new technology were the innovative engineers.
meanings.sent2: The begetters of the delicious meal were the talented chefs.
meanings.sent3: The begetters of the chaos in the office were the mischievous interns.
meanings.sent4: The begetters of change often face resistance from the status quo.
meanings.sent5: The begetters of progress are often met with admiration and gratitude.
